ml_tags: Desperado Why didn't you come to your senses?    You were out riding fences for so long.  These things that pleased you hurt your life, somehow.  You were getting no younger.  Your pain and hunger were driving you down.    Your prison was walking through this life all alone. Your have come down from your fences.  Open the gate there is a rainbow above you. Your wife, Susan AUGUST 31, 1956      -      MARCH 15, 2021 GARY  RANDOLF STONE Written by Glenn Frey and Don Henley 1973 Let God Love and Protect You and Rest in Peace.
